name: Power Slam
description: Strike an enemy full-force with your shield, dealing 2399 Physical Damage.  While slotted, blocking any attack grants you Resentment, which increases the damage of your next Power Slam cast within 10 seconds by 33%.  This ability's damage is considered Bash damage and interrupts the enemy if they are casting.
effectLines: Blocking any attack increases the damage of your next Power Slam.
coefDescription: Strike an enemy full-force with your shield, dealing $1 Physical Damage.  While slotted, blocking any attack grants you Resentment, which increases the damage of your next Power Slam cast within 10 seconds by 33%.  This ability's damage is considered Bash damage and interrupts the enemy if they are casting.
